title: Importing metrics in Fontographer
content: I have done all the spacing and kerning for my font, except the "foreign" letters, like
author: magnus

comments.content:
You need to set up a kerning assistance file in FOG.   
   
This may solve your problems: [http://www.typotheque.com/type\_utilities/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022034341/http:/www.typotheque.com/type_utilities/)   
   
Check out the Accent Kern Maker

You can get FOG to do this all for you using Metrics   
Assistance. Just set the base character ("a" for instance);   
choose "Left" and "Right" (or "Width") under   
"Characteristics"; type in your characters under "Apply to   
these characters" ("
Thank you a million Mark Simonson, just what I was looking for!
